features: EXFOLIATING TONER - This gentle facial toner contains a balanced mix of medical-grade Glycolic and Lactic Acids, the two most effective Alpha Hydroxy Acids, that provides a resurfacing effect, leaving the skin brighter and smoother, helping to fade fine lines and wrinkles, and promoting a more even skin tone
OPTIMIZED pH - Formulated scientifically in order to adjust the pH to the most effective yet least irritating effect for all types of skins, from dry to oily, combination and acne-prone.
HYDRATING EFFECT - Leveraging a combination of Hydrolyzed Rice Protein and Sodium PCA, this toner leaves the skin fully hydrated and plumper looking, reducing the signs of age

POWERFUL NATURAL EXTRACTS - This serum contains Pomegranate Extract, a natural anti-oxidant that neutralizes the effect of free radicals and prevents wrinkles and sagging, along with Ginkgo Biloba Extract, a centuries old anti-aging ingredient with a proven track record

All QRxLabs products are made in the USA in an FDA-registered facility. We only use professional-grade ingredients and never any silicone or parabens. We also take pride in our cruelty-free practices and eco-friendly packaging, so that you can purchase and use our products with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Glycolic Acid Toner by QRxLabs QRxLabs Glycolic Acid Toner is a professional-strength facial toner formulated to provide an exfoliating effect without overly irritating the skin. It combines natural ingredients such as Pomegranate and Ginkgo extracts, and Hydrolized Rice Protein with medical-grade Glycolic and Lactic acids, without any artificial fragrances or parabens. It helps to reduce acne and fine lines, and to improve radiance over time. This toner’s advanced formulation features a precisely balanced pH of 3.8 that maximizes its exfoliating effect while minimizing irritation and sensitization of top dermal layers. Benefits of daily use: Even out skin toneAttract and retain moistureAccelerate cell turnoverLeave skin feeling clean and glowing It is worth noting that this product is completely free of artificial fragrances, silicones, parabens and coloring ingredients. It is proudly manufactured in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHAT IS THIS SORCERY??
reviews.reviewText: I bought this expecting…well, nothing, essentially. And somehow my 53 year old skin is glowing a bit and I swear my fine lines are less visible. I’ve purchased a lot of skin care products. I mean, a lot. Creams and moisturizers and serums… applied them religiously and have seen absolutely no difference. This seemingly simple and remarkably affordable toner feels nice going on, and again…skin is GLOWING! Will be buying again for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Evening Out Skin Tone and Hydrating Dry Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I felt like I needed a deeper cleansing step of my skincare routine aside from my cleanser. I’ve been religiously using this toner every night for the past few months and this has really helped even out my skin tone and brighten it. I don’t break out much, but when I do, this gets rid of the pimples relatively quickly and does a good job of evening out any scarring that happens. The scent is a pretty mild witch hazel scent (which makes sense since it’s the third ingredient) that isn’t overwhelming at all.I have sensitive skin so I was a little afraid that this would irritate my skin but I’ve had no issues. My dry skin seems to really enjoy the added hydration and the price is really reasonable for how big of a bottle you’re getting. I use this every night and pair it with a moisturizing toner, and it does wonders for my skin!The only issue I have is the dispensing method, which is a Press cap that pours out the toner. I’m not sure if others have had this issue but it tends to spill all over the cap and once it dries, it crystalizes and makes the cap all sticky. Instead, I just take the whole cap off and pour it straight from the opening onto a reusable cotton pad. The toner still spills a bit but nothing too crazy, so I just have to wipe down the opening every now and then.Aside from that, it has certainly become a regular in my skincare routine and I will be buying again once I run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product contains 10% glycolic acid. Usually hard to find this strength! If you have sensitive skin, please be cautious and follow directions. I use it daily. Brightens my skin and keeps fine lines at bay. Purchased it to replace Mederma Glycolic Toner as I sadly can't find that one anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this in hopes it would work magic like Paula's Choice, but it's a no for me. It's more like a water consistency so i use a cotton pad to apply it. It leaves an uncomfortable, annoying residue on my face - kinda sticky. Haven't noticed any benefits at all. **Updated review 1/3/24. The seller reached out to address any concerns I had. Very proactive and stands behind their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Okay, this is great for your night time routine. It leaves your skin moist and luxurious! Anti aging and clearer skin - score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Scent is overpowering.
reviews.reviewText: I hope it is helping. This is my first trial with this brand as my favorite is no longer available. I am 75 and I use it mostly as a toner, but also still get pimples occasionally. I have used aqua glycolic successfully for many years to treat acne blemishes. However, this is unpleasant because of the strong odor. I will look for another brand next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good skin care product for post-cleansing.
reviews.reviewText: This toner does the job for my sensitive skin without tightening or drying. It exfoliates and returns skin to a natural Ph. No more blackheads and whiteheads!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toner does what it says. Exfoliating, softening and moisturizing without being sticky. Love it, will repurchase.
Muito hidratante, faz meses que uso e gosto muito.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a skincare specialist who recommended and I’m loving it. Great results in the first few days!
Used it on my body for exfoliation. Seems gentle enough. However the cap leaks, resulting in wastage. I unscrew the cap and pour directly from the bottle.
Amei o produto . A minha pele ta ficando linda

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like the smell very much but I think your product seems good.If I find another product that smells better I will dump this one.
